SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 12 Volt Power Supply
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 12 Volt Power Supply is a 12 Volt, 2A Power Supply for UHD60 units.  Includes US, UK, EU and AU adapters. (Not compatible with 2E, 2EA, 2EMP and 1WE encoders)

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 20 Volt Power Supply
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 20 Volt Power Supply is a 20 Volt, 6A Power Supply for UHD60 Encoder units.  Does not include power cable.  (Only compatible with 2E, 2Ea and 2EMP units)

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Component/VGA RF/IP Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Component/VGA R/F Media Module Blade is a HD video encoder/modulator used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2 DIN inputs for up to 1080i/1080p component video/digital and analog audio or VGA video/analog audio and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C and UDP IP stream output. Closed Captions supported on composite input. Cables sold separately, requires "Hydra" DIN cables Zv709 (component), ZV710 (VGA), Zv739 (mini-DIN for DTV H25). No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Component/VGA Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Component/VGA Media Module Blade is a HD video encoder/modulator used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2 DIN inputs for up to 1080i/1080p component video/digital and analog audio or VGA video/analog audio and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C. 2 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported on composite input. Cables sold separately, requires "Hydra" DIN cables Zv709 (component), ZV710 (VGA), Zv739 (mini-DIN for DTV H25).

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDMI RF/IP Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDMI RF/IP Media Module Blade is a HD video encoder/modulator used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2  HDMI inputs up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C and UDP IP stream output. 2 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite (3.5mm input). Cables sold separately. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDMI Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDMI Media Module Blade is a HD video encoder/modulator used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2 HDMI inputs up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C. 2 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite (3.5mm input). Cables sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDSDI Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDSDI Media Module Blade is a HD video encoder/modulator used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2 HDSDI video inputs with embedded digital audio up to 1080i/1080p with loop through output and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C. Cables sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDSDI RF/IP Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 HDSDI RF/IP Media Module Blades is a HD video encoder/modulator Media Module used in HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes 2 HDSDI video inputs with embedded digital audio up to 1080i/1080p with loop through output and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C and UDP IP stream output. Cables sold separately. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Composite Media Module Blade
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Composite Media Module Blade is an SD video encoder/modulator used in the HDbridge3000 Chassis that includes: 6 composite video/analog audio inputs via 3.5mm connector and is MPEG-2 RF output configurable for QAM or DVB-T/C via 6 digital channels using 2 QAM RF frequencies or 6 digital channels via 3 DVB-T/C frequencies. Supports Closed Captions. Cables sold separately, requires ZeeVee CAVC6 break out cables. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Spare Control Module
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDbridge3000 Spare Control Module is sold as spare for back up/hot swap for configuration/management. Requires Hybridge 3000 Chassis for use.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb2312-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb-2312-EU is a SD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 12 composite video/analog 3.5mm audio inputs. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF output via 12 digital channels using 4 DVB-T/C RF frequencies. 1 delay match analog audio output. Supports Closed Captions. Rack ears and power cord included. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb2840-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb2840-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 4 HDMI inputs up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF output. 1 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite. Rack ears and power cord included. Cables sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb2920-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb2920-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 2 HDSDI video inputs with embedded digital audio inputs up to 1080i/1080p with loop through output. Also supports analog audio input for each video input. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF output. 1 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Rack ears and power cord included. Cables sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb2920i-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDb2920i-EU is HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 2 HDSDI video inputs with embedded digital audio inputs up to 1080i/1080p with loop through output. Also supports analog audio input for each video input. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF or UDP IP streaming output. 1 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Rack ears and power cord included. Cables sold separately. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: HDb3000 Chassis and Control Module
LONG DESCRIPTION: HDbridge3000 Chassis System is modular with slots for up to 12 hot-swappable cards, allowing you to mix and match cards with different interfaces and resolutions as needed. Populate the chassis with up to 72 channels of SD over RF, 24 channels of HD over RF (with the optional IP streams), 48 channels of H.264 IP streams or a mix of cards as required. Combine multiple HDbridge3000 units to increase the number of channels. Includes 1 Control Module for configuration/management, 2 hot swappable power supplies with cords, 4 hot swappable fans and 8 blank face plates covering empty slots. Cables sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: STBi3
LONG DESCRIPTION: STBi3 is an IP decoder supporting H.264/H.265 UDP and RTP steams via 100Mb/copper with HDMI output.  RF tuner for decoding QAM signals over coax. Supports PoE. STBi3 auto-discovers the ZyPerMX, ZyPerMX2/4, HDBridge and ZvPro iSeries streams, which are sold separately. Includes IR remote and batteries, IR pigtail, universal power supply, and HDMI cable.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & 12G SDI Copper Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and 12G SDI input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports analog audio, IR, RS-232. No USB. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included.Available 09/01/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & 12G SDI Copper Encoder with USB
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and 12G SDI input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports USB, analog audio, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included. Available 09/01/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & 12G SDI Fiber Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and 12G SDI input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/fiber. Supports analog audio, IR, RS-232. No USB. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included. Available 09/01/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & 12G SDI Fiber Encoder with USB
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and 12G SDI input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/fiber. Supports USB, analog audio, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included. Available 09/01/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & Analog Video Copper Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended module, HDMI 2.0 and analog video (component, composite, VGA, S-video) input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports analog audio, IR, RS-232. No USB. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & analog Video Copper Encoder with USB
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and analog video (component, composite, VGA, S-video) input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports USB, analog audio, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & Analog Video Fiber Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and analog video (component, composite, VGA, S-video) input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/fiber. Supports analog audio, IR, RS-232. No USB. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended HDMI 2.0 & Analog Video Fiber Encoder with USB
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Extended Module, HDMI 2.0 and analog video (component, composite, VGA, S-video) input Encoder, with IP streaming via 10Gbit/fiber. Supports USB, analog audio, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Decoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Rack Mount Filler Plate Standard
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Rack Mount Filler Plate Standard (ZV757) is used to cover unused slots in a ZyPer4K Rack Mount Kit.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Rack Mount Filler Plate Center Carrier Bracket
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Rack Mount Filler Plate Center Carrier (ZVZ-225) is used to cover partially unused slots that are populated with a standard ZyPer4K unit in an ZyPer4K Rack Mount Kit Extended.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4k Rack Mount Filler Plate Extended
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4k Rack Mount Filler Plate Extended (ZVZ-226) is used to cover unused slots in an ZyPer4K Rack Mount Kit Extended.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K Wing Mount Bracket
LONG DESCRIPTION: The ZyPer4K Wing Mount Bracket is for ZyPer4K encoders/decoders.  Enables mounting to floors, ceilings, desks, walls etc. Contains 2 brackets for single encoder/decoder. Not compatible with ZyPerXS units.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 Copper Decoder with USB and Dante
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 output Decoder with Dante Transmitter accepts IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports USB, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Encoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 Copper Decoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 output Decoder, accepts IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports analog audio, IR, RS-232. No USB. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Encoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 Copper Decoder with USB
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K HDMI 2.0 output Decoder, accepts IP streaming via 10Gbit/copper. Supports USB, analog audio, IR, RS-232. Includes power supply. Requires ZyPer4K Encoder. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K-XR Decoder Copper Rugged Enclosure
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K-XR HDMI 2.0 output Decoder, accepts IP streaming via 10Gbit/Copper. PoE. Supports HDMI and Analog audio Input.  USB supported with between ZyPer4K XS/XR devices. SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 Encoder, Wall Plate, 2 x 1 Switching
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60, HDMI 2.0 input Wall Plate Encoder with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports HDMI 2.0a and USB-C video inputs capable of up to 4KP60 4:4:4 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.3 encryption, USB, and POE. Requires ZyPerUHD60 Decoder. Cables not included. Power supply sold separately. Available 10/2023.

Power supply sold separately. Available 09/2023.

LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60, HDMI 2.0 output Dante Enabled Decoder with phoenix connectors for analog audio, accepts IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Available 09/2023.

LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60, 3x1 Switching Encoder (Dual HDMI and USB-C) with phoenix connector for analog audio in/out, with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports HDMI 2.0a capable of up to 4KP60 4:4:4 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.3 encryption, USB, IR, RS-232 (via phoenix), HDMI passthrough, and Dual 1G LAN ports (1 supporting POE). Includes IR pigtail and wall mount brackets. Requires ZyPerUHD60 Decoder. Cables not included.  20V supply available separately to supply charging over USB-C port. Power supply sold separately. Available 09/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 Encoder, 3x1 Switching Input, Dual LAN with Dante
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60, Dante Enabled 3x1 Switching Encoder (Dual HDMI and USB-C) with phoenix connector for analog audio in/out, with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports HDMI 2.0a capable of up to 4KP60 4:4:4 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.3 encryption, USB, IR, RS-232 (via phoenix), HDMI passthrough, and Dual 1G LAN ports (1 supporting POE). Includes IR pigtail and wall mount brackets. Requires ZyPerUHD60 Decoder. Cables not included.  20V supply available separately to supply charging over USB-C port. Power supply sold separately. Available 09/2023.

LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60, 3x1 Switching Encoder (Dual HDMI and USB-C) with phoenix connector for analog audio in/out, with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports HDMI 2.0a capable of up to 4KP60 4:4:4 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.3 encryption, USB, IR, RS-232 (via phoenix), HDMI passthrough, and Dual 1G LAN ports (1 supporting POE). Includes integrated ZyPer Management Platform running on a dedicated processor. Power supply sold separately. Available 09/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 Spare Blank Panel
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 Spare blank panel for ZUHD60RACK. Available 04/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Enterprise Appliance Unlimited Licenses (MP)
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Enterprise Appliance Unlimited Licenses (MP) is a LINUX appliance (1RU Rack Mount System) with API and intuitive web interface for management of ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Encoders and Decoders. Includes power supply and licenses for up to Unlimited Encoder/Decoders.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Unlimited Management Platform (MP)
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Unlimited Management Platform (MP) is a LINUX appliance (NUC) with API and intuitive web interface for management of ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Encoders and Decoders. Includes power supply and unlimited Encoder/Decoder licenses.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerHUD60 Unlimited Management Platform (MP) for VMWare
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60 Unlimited Management Platform (MP) for VMWare ESXi is software for installation on VMware with API and intuitive web interface for management of ZyPerUHD and ZyPerUHD60  Encoders and Decoders. Includes license for unlimited Encoder/Decoders. Requires VMware ESXi platform, sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 6RU Rack Mount
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD60 6RU Rack mount. Holds up to 10 ZyPerUHD60 encoders/decoders. Includes 4 blank panels. Available 04/2023.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Blank Filler Plater
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Blank Filler Plate is used to cover unused slots in ZyPerUHD Rack Mount Kit

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Rack Kit
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Rack Mount Kit holds upto 10 ZyPerUHD Encoders/Decoders in standard 6RU space. Includes rack assembly, 10 carrier units.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect Transmitter Charging Cradle.  Holds 4 transmitters
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect charging cradle unit to simultaneously charge up to 4 ZVconnect transmitter units.  Includes cradle and power supply/cable.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless system room kit with HDMI transmitters
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless room kit with HDMI transmitters.  Includes 1 receiver unit and 2 transmitter units with HDMI inputs.  Also includes 3 USB cables, 3 2A USB power blocks

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless system room kit with HDMI and USB-C transmitter
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless room kit with HDMI transmitters.  Includes 1 receiver unit, 1 transmitter unit with USB-C input and 1 transmitter unit with HDMI input.  Also includes 3 USB cables, 3 2A USB power blocks.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless system room kit with USB-C transmitters
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZVconnect wireless room kit with HDMI transmitters.  Includes 1 receiver unit and 2 transmitter units with USB-C inputs.  Also includes 3 USB cables, 3 2A USB power blocks.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZVPRK Pro Rack Kit
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvPro Rack Kit includes 2 rack mount ears and 8 mounting screws. When used ZvPro fits in standard 1RU space.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZvPro810-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvPro810-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 1 HDMI video input up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio input. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF output. Delay match analog audio out for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite. Includes power supply. Cables and Rack Kit sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZvPro810i-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvPro810i-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 1 HDMI video input up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio input. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF and UDP IP stream output. Delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite. Includes power supply. Cables and Rack Kit sold separately. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZvPro820-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvPro820-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 2 HDMI inputs up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF output. 1 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite. Includes power supply. Cables and Rack Kit sold separately.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZvPro820i-EU
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvPro820i-EU is a HD video encoder/DVB-T/C modulator with 2 HDMI inputs up to 1080i/1080p with embedded digital audio or analog audio. MPEG-2 DVB-T/C RF and UDP IP stream output. 1 delay match analog audio output for analog audio input. Closed Captions supported via composite. Includes power supply. Cables and Rack Kit sold separately. No ZvShow.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZvSync DVB-T/C Tuner
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZvSync DVB-T/C Tuner is a digital DVB-T/C/ATSC tuner/decoder providing video output via composite with analog audio or HDMI with embedded digital audio. Includes IR pigtail, IR remote control and power supply.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K WP power supply
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPer4K WP Power Supply is a 24V power supply with 2-pin phoenix connector for use with ZyPer4K Wall plate encoders and decoders.  (Not for use with any other ZyPer4K product)

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerPad - 10x Button Interface
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerPad is a 10-button IP enabled keypad controller which provides a simple means of sending commands to the ZyPer Management Platform (ZMP). With built-in PoE, it can receive power from an PoE enabled ethernet switch. It supports individual button configuration via a simple to use web user interface.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Decoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD, HDMI 2.0 output Decoder with phoenix connectors for analog audio, accepts IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports USB, IR, RS-232 (via phoenix), POE. Includes power supply, IR pigtail and wall mount brackets. Requires ZyPerUHD Encoder and ZyPerUHD/ZyPerHD management Platform. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD, HDMI 2.0 input Encoder with phoenix connectors for analog audio, with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Supports HDMI 2.0a capable of up to 4KP60 4:2:0 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.2 encryption, USB, IR, RS-232 (via phoenix), HDMI passthrough, and POE. Includes power supply, IR pigtail and wall mount brackets. Requires ZyPerUHD Decoder and ZyPerUHD/ZyPerHD Management Platform. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Wallplate Encoder
LONG DESCRIPTION: ZyPerUHD Wallplate Encoder is a HDMI 2.0 and VGA input Encoder with IP streaming via Gbit/copper. Ports include: Audio Input of unbalanced stereo audio on 3.5mm jack, VGA video on 15-pin D-sub connector (no audio), HDMI 2.0a capable of up to 4KP60 4:2:0 with embedded audio and HDCP 2.2 encryption, IR, RS-232 control port and USB 2.0 Type B and POE. Power supply is not include. Includes wall mount brackets. Requires ZyPerUHD Decoder and ZyPerUHD/ZyPerHD management Platform. Cables not included.

SHORT DESCRIPTION: CV620-WI2 PTZ Camera with IP & USB3 - White
LONG DESCRIPTION: HD PTZ 20x Camera with 3GSDI, HDMI, USB 3.0 and IP (White)
